text: Sundarmare Sookshikkuka is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K Narayanan, starring Devan and Shari in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Devan as S.I Raju * Shari as Priya Raveedran * Rohini as Nimmy *Radha Ravi as Madhu * Sandhya as Rama * Santha Devi as Saraswathi Ravedran *M. G. Soman as C.P Ravedran (S.P) * Vijayan as S.I Murali ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Sundarimare Sookshikkuka
